page.title: 11Communications
page.content: We are told that there is a revolution about to take over our lives in terms of communicating. We can already use our credit card numbers to order things advertised on the television. Radio telephones which allow people to talk on the telephone from their cars or any other location they wish are becoming very popular. News items, weather and interesting information can be called up on television screens. Verbal communication seems to be in a decline as most people spend most of their time staring at television screens.
